name: AI-Powered Lead Qualification
description: Automated lead scoring and qualification using Manus AI

steps.manus_prompt: Analyze lead data including demographics, firmographics, behavior, and engagement history.
Score lead based on fit, interest, and buying intent. Use predictive analytics for qualification.
Create personalized outreach message based on lead profile, interests, and pain points.
Design multi-touch follow-up sequence based on lead behavior and engagement patterns.
Prepare sales handoff package with lead insights, recommended approach, and next steps.
